fields.headline: France call up Anelka
fields.bodyText: Raymond Domenech, the France coach, appears to have settled his dispute with Nicolas Anelka after calling up the Bolton Wanderers striker for the Scotland game as cover because of doubts over Louis Saha and with the injured Sidney Govou already ruled out. It is Anelka's first appearance in France's squad since the 2-1 friendly loss to Slovakia in March. He has won 31 caps and scored seven goals.
